Uses of Class
org.interworldtransport.cladosG.Blade

Packages that use Blade
Package
Description
org.interworldtransport.cladosG
Provides the geometry classes and the structures needed for multi-algebra geometric models.

  • Uses of Blade in org.interworldtransport.cladosG

    Classes in org.interworldtransport.cladosG that implement interfaces with type arguments of type Blade
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Blade
    A Blade is essentially an outer product space built from 0 to many vectors.

    Constructors in org.interworldtransport.cladosG with parameters of type Blade
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    Blade(Blade pB)
    This is a copy constructor that builds an identical blade.
     
    Blade(Blade pB, Generator pGen)
    This is a copy constructor that builds an identical blade, but with a maximum generator size just big enough to make room for adding the offered generator.
     
    BladeDuet(Blade pB1, Blade pB2)
    This is a re-use constructor that builds this as a juxtaposition of the two offered blades.
